intent_atoms.description: Add macOS SwiftUI automation for streaming selection defaults to ensure tree/detail panes update end-to-end during live parses.
The UI hooks must land and the automation must verify that tree/detail panes update correctly during live parsing.
Throughput parity with the CLI harness must be maintained when executing Combine-backed UI benchmark on macOS.
Execute the Combine-backed UI benchmark on macOS to capture latency metrics on a platform that ships Combine.
The benchmark must run on macOS hardware and produce latency metrics while keeping throughput parity with CLI harness.
Surface global logging and telemetry toggles once streaming metrics are exposed to the CLI.

functional_units.name: macOS SwiftUI Automation for Streaming Selection Defaults
functional_units.description: Automates the selection defaults in the streaming UI on macOS using XCTest UI hooks to ensure tree/detail panes update end-to-end during live parses.

functional_units.name: Combine-backed UI Benchmark on macOS
functional_units.description: Executes a benchmark that measures latency metrics for the Combine-based UI on macOS, maintaining throughput parity with the CLI harness.

functional_units.name: Global Logging and Telemetry Toggles for CLI Streaming
functional_units.description: Provides global toggles to enable or disable logging and telemetry when streaming metrics are exposed through the command-line interface.
